name: mr.TrYhArD[tye]
text: Made a order at 6:03 its now 8:14 clerk says its out for delivery an hour ago we live 2.3miles away.  Never again will we do business here what a joke üòí

name: Krista Antonini Martin
text: Hungry Howie's Pizza is great.

name: Abigail Steele
text: The Customer service definitely needs help- waited for 3 or 4 minutes to be acknowledged to pick up my pizza, then was told I‚Äôd be helped in a minute (at least 5 staff were visible, but none were assisting customers). ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason De La Paz
text: Need to hire new staff very unprofessional and no knowledge on how a pizza shop should be ran period. Will be personally finding out who the owner is to see if they know their business is being poorly managed. So far its been 2 1/2 hours

name: Alex L
text: The pizza was great the customer service on the other hand not so much. I left feeling like I was an unwanted customer. The kid that cashed me out waited a while to come to the register and when he did he rolled his eyes and sighed.

name: loretta richards
text: There is always a very nice young lady in there with pink hair!. She is always very Sweet and Helpful, She offers me Plates and napkins and is always pleasant . I love Hungry Howies Pizza and Have for Years

name: natasha wagner
text: Lately they‚Äôve been putting like wayyyy too much sauce on the pizza so I just ordered lite sauce AND THERE‚ÄôS ABSOLUTELY NO SAUCE.

name: Geneva Jackson
text: I love this place!! Fast, Friendly, Delicious, and cheap too!! Perfect for that night i have had a busy day, and just dont have it in me to cook dinner!! O did i mention? I love this place!! üëçüëç

name: Kiyashii W.
text: good pizza for when im in the mood but the staff, specifically managers ive noticed, seem very immature

name: Debbie Lucido
text: Last Friday night around 7 pm I called to place an order and was put on hold. I sat on hold for 9.51 minutes. When a guy answered, all he said was hello? My response was telling him how long I sat on hold. NO apology though. I told him that ‚Ä¶More

name: Dan Gizar
text: The St Clair location does a great job of ensuring quality and service. They are committed to consistency and their end product reflects it.

name: Miz Parker
text: The last few times my pizza was hot, fresh and my 5 cheeser bread wasn't overcooked so i thought things were getting better nope. Ordered around 5:40 for a 7:10 delivery, when I order i expect it to be on time because i have to get back to ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Degiacomo
text: Store Managers different same problems with the delivery driver's driving too fast and nearly hitting the residents of St Clair who walk.  As food good great price slow service because of didn't ask for a name for take out orders

name: paul newman
text:
Pizza took 1 hour and twenty minutes to get here. Ordered well done it was not.
Pizza was cold ad soggy the box was even damp.

name: Gilligan 16
text: Tis pizza cant go wrong. Friendly staff including the delivery deivers. Hot pizza 20 min after you order.

name: poetic goddess
text: Okay better if they pay attention to covering actually pizza all over with cheese not just one side

text: Always love geting my sub.

text: Mess my order up everytime i order.

name: Patricia Powers
text: I enjoy their cheese pizza

name: Nancy Beaudua
text: Our pizza was done just before the electricity went out

name: Jeremy Messenger
text: Pizza n subs n stuffs. Good crust

name: Lauren Martin
text: Their customer service is AWFUL!! I have never called once without being overcharged because their staff can't figure out how to properly input an order. And don't even bother trying to explain their error, you're better off making a pizza yourself!

name: Nina Belkiewicz
text: Best pizza, sub, and wings I've had in awhile! & Delivery was quick also! Thank you!!!

name: joey hoffman
text: Iv never incounterd a staff so rude! They were terrible! we waited 3 hours for our food, called 2 different times and they told us it was on its way and still never came  it was a HORRIBLE experience!

name: jason hill
text: Fairly okay pizza but extremely rude staff. They will blame the customer for an employees mistake till theyre blue in the face, I might as well go there make my own pizza and deliver it myself, to myself and still tip the guy who was suppose to do it. Try Marysville they're not so bad

name: Brian Hayden
text: Ive never tried hungry howies pizza to say

name: Paul Pauly
text: One of my favorite places to eat of all time can a slow service but they get the job done

name: billy spradlin
text: thank goodness for hungry howies. I had pizza for a week last time I worked around here. always good!!

name: Danny Causey
text: Ordered a pick up they said 15- 20 mins I show up almost 30 mins gave them a lead y on time..... I get here and they didn't even have the pepperoni on the pizza not even in the oven. The excuse the the gave me more call came in... That means those orders were put first smh
